required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Posture and Mobility Measurements of the Upper Quadrant in Asymptomatic Subjects by Means of a Smartphone
clinical_study.official_title: Posture and Mobility Measurements of the Upper Quadrant in Asymptomatic Subjects by Means of a Smartphone

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims to investigate posture-mobility associations in the upper quadrant by means of smartphone measurements

detailed_description.textblock:
One purpose of this study is to measure the magnitude of the thoracic kyphosis, thoracic spine extension, and side-to-side differences in scapular protraction and elbow extension range of motion during the median nerve neurodynamic test through a smartphone (iPhone 4, app Compass, iOS 7.1.1), and to assess the intrarater agreement parameters.
Another purpose is to assess associations between thoracic kyphosis, thoracic spine extension, scapular protraction and the resting length of the pectoralis minor muscle through smartphone, photographs and tape measurements.

primary_outcome.time_frame: At the time of the assessment
primary_outcome.description: Elbow extension range of motion (in degrees) during the median nerve neurodynamic test is measured by means of a smartphone (iPhone 4, app Compass, iOS 7.1.1)

primary_outcome.time_frame: At the time of the assessment
primary_outcome.description: The magnitude of the thoracic kyphosis (in degrees) in the standing upright position is measured by means of a smartphone (iPhone 4, app Compass, iOS 7.1.1)

primary_outcome.measure: Thoracic spine extension range of motion
primary_outcome.time_frame: At the time of the assessment
primary_outcome.description: The extension range of motion of the thoracic spine (in degrees) in the standing upright position is measured by means of a smartphone (iPhone 4, app Compass, iOS 7.1.1)

primary_outcome.time_frame: At the time of the assessment
primary_outcome.description: The magnitude of the scapular protraction (in degrees) in the standing upright position with the arms at rest is measured by means of a smartphone (iPhone 4, app Compass, iOS 7.1.1)

primary_outcome.time_frame: At the time of the assessment
primary_outcome.description: Pectoralis minor muscle resting length (in centimeters) with the arms at rest is measured by means of a measuring tape in the standing upright position

primary_outcome.time_frame: At the time of the assessment
primary_outcome.description: The magnitude of the thoracic kyphosis (in degrees) in the standing upright position is measured on digital photographs by means of a computer software

primary_outcome.measure: Thoracic spine extension range of motion
primary_outcome.time_frame: At the time of the assessment
primary_outcome.description: The extension range of motion of the thoracic spine (in degrees) in the standing upright position is measured on digital photographs by means of a computer software

clinical_study.condition: Posture and Mobility of the Upper Quadrant

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age > 18 years old
- Normal mobility in the joints of the upper quadrant
Exclusion Criteria:
- complaints in the upper quadrant over the past 3 months
- significant deformities in the upper quadrant
- leg length discrepancy > 1.5 cm

facility.name: Escola Superior de Saúde do Instituto Politécnico de Leiria

responsible_party.investigator_title: Master student in traditional chinese medicine
